headline: PPG introduces ultrafiltration antifouling membrane for water treatment
summary: PITTSBURGH, November 04, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced the introduction of an ultrafiltration (UF) antifouling membrane for industrial water purification and treatment to its portfolio of spiral-wound filter elements. Developed to meet growing demand for sustainable UF filtration solutions, the new membrane is engineered to handle extremely hard-to-treat water containing a wide range1 of oily waste and other contaminants, enabling safe and economical disposal or reuse.
